meanings.definition: A type of product manufactured by a particular company under a particular name.
meanings.sent1: The store's brand of soda is very popular among kids.
meanings.sent2: I prefer that brand of cereal over the others.
meanings.sent3: The brand of ice cream melted so quickly, it was like magic!
meanings.sent4: Her brand of humor always leaves everyone laughing.
meanings.sent5: The brand of shampoo promised shiny, soft hair, and it delivered.

meanings.definition: A particular type or kind of something.
meanings.sent1: His brand of leadership is known for its fairness.
meanings.sent2: I like that brand of music because it's so relaxing.
meanings.sent3: The brand of jokes he tells always cracks me up.
meanings.sent4: Her brand of kindness is truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The brand of weather we had today was perfect for a picnic.

meanings.definition: A mark made by burning with a hot iron to show ownership.
meanings.sent1: The rancher put his brand on the cattle before releasing them.
meanings.sent2: The brand on the wooden crate indicated its origin.
meanings.sent3: The brand on the toast was a surprise smiley face.
meanings.sent4: His brand on the project was evident in every detail.
meanings.sent5: The brand on the leather bag added a touch of elegance.
